name: Hold The Finger On The Line
name_original: Hold The Finger On The Line
description:
Your finger is the player in this simple one touch controls game! It's an endless game and it will test your nerves.

The speed increases the longer you play! How long can you follow the way?

Features:
-Good for all ages
-Endless game
-Easy to play with one touch controls
-Easy graphic and cool sounds
